template.name: Template HPE MSA 1040-2040 Plus
template.description: Monitor HPE MSA storages models1040/2040+ (not for use with P2000G3 and lower). The template excludes some char items, which dublicates by numeric ones.

item_prototype.name: Controller {#CONTROLLER.ID} ping check
item_prototype.description: Controller {#CONTROLLER.ID} with IP {#CONTROLLER.IP} ICMP ping check.

item_prototype.name: Controller {#CONTROLLER.ID} CPU Load, %
item_prototype.description: MSA controller {#CONTROLLER.ID} CPU load in percent.

item_prototype.name: Controller {#CONTROLLER.ID} flash card health status, numeric
item_prototype.description: MSA controller {#CONTROLLER.ID} flash card health status (numeric)

item_prototype.name: Controller {#CONTROLLER.ID} redundancy status, numeric
item_prototype.description:
MSA controller {#CONTROLLER.ID} redundancy status (numeric).
!!! HP Documentation says that value mapping for redundancy looks like that:
0: Operational but not redundant 3: Redundant 4: Down 5: Unknown
But, in my case it's lies. "Redundant" equals "2".
!!!

trigger_prototype.name: Controller {#CONTROLLER.ID} health status {ITEM.LASTVALUE}
trigger_prototype.description: Controller {#CONTROLLER.ID} health status is not OK ({ITEM.LASTVALUE}).

trigger_prototype.name: Controller {#CONTROLLER.ID} operational status {ITEM.LASTVALUE}
trigger_prototype.description: Controller {#CONTROLLER.ID} operational status is not OK ({ITEM.LASTVALUE}).

trigger_prototype.name: Controller {#CONTROLLER.ID} ping failed
trigger_prototype.description: Controller {#CONTROLLER.ID} doesn't responce on ping.

trigger_prototype.name: Controller {#CONTROLLER.ID} redundancy status {ITEM.LASTVALUE}
trigger_prototype.description: Controller {#CONTROLLER.ID} redundancy status is not OK ({ITEM.LASTVALUE}).

trigger_prototype.name: Flash card on Controller {#CONTROLLER.ID} health status {ITEM.LASTVALUE}
trigger_prototype.description: Flash card on controller {#CONTROLLER.ID} status is not OK ({ITEM.LASTVALUE}).

trigger_prototype.name: Flash card on Controller {#CONTROLLER.ID} operational status {ITEM.LASTVALUE}
trigger_prototype.description: Flash card on controller {#CONTROLLER.ID} operational status is not OK ({ITEM.LASTVALUE}).

trigger_prototype.name: Web interface on controller {#CONTROLLER.ID} ({#CONTROLLER.IP}) is down
trigger_prototype.description: Cannot connect to controller {#CONTROLLER.ID} web interface.

discovery_rule.name: Disk groups discovery
discovery_rule.description: Discovery all HPE MSA disk groups.

item_prototype.name: Disk group {#DG.ID} health status, numeric
item_prototype.description: Disk group {#DG.ID} with type {#DG.TYPE} health status (numeric).

item_prototype.name: Disk group {#DG.ID} preferred owner, numeric
item_prototype.description: Disk group {#DG.ID} with type {#DG.TYPE} preferred owner (numeric)

item_prototype.name: Disk group {#DG.ID} operational status, numeric
item_prototype.description: Disk group {#DG.ID} with type {#DG.TYPE} operational status (numeric).

valuemap.name: HPE MSA Disk Group and Vdisk status

trigger_prototype.name: Disk group {#DG.ID} current owner is not preferred
trigger_prototype.description: Current disk group {#DG.ID} not preferred for this one.

trigger_prototype.name: Disk group {#DG.ID} health status is {ITEM.LASTVALUE}
trigger_prototype.description: Disk group {#DG.ID} health status is not OK.

trigger_prototype.name: Disk group {#DG.ID} operational status is {ITEM.LASTVALUE}
trigger_prototype.description: Disk group {#DG.ID} operational status is not OK.

discovery_rule.name: Physical disks discovery
discovery_rule.description: Discovery all HPE MSA physical disks.

item_prototype.name: Physical diks {#DISK.ID} error status
item_prototype.description: Health error status of physical disk {#DISK.ID} with SN {#DISK.SN}.

item_prototype.name: Physical diks {#DISK.ID} health status, numeric
item_prototype.description: Health status of physical disk {#DISK.ID} with SN {#DISK.SN} (numeric)

item_prototype.name: Physical diks {#DISK.ID} power on hours
item_prototype.description: Power on hours of physical disk {#DISK.ID} with SN {#DISK.SN}.

item_prototype.name: Physical diks {#DISK.ID} temperature
item_prototype.description: Temperature of physical disk {#DISK.ID} with SN {#DISK.SN}.

trigger_prototype.name: Disk {#DISK.ID} health status is {ITEM.LASTVALUE}
trigger_prototype.description: Physical disk {#DISK.ID} health status is not OK.

trigger_prototype.name: Disk {#DISK.ID} last error status is {ITEM.LASTVALUE}
trigger_prototype.description: Physical disk {#DISK.ID} last error status is not 0.

trigger_prototype.name: Disk {#DISK.ID} summary work time too big ({ITEM.LASTVALUE} hours)
trigger_prototype.description: Physical disk {#DISK.ID} summary work hourse too big. Maybe, you should replace it.

trigger_prototype.name: Disk {#DISK.ID} temperature too big ({ITEM.LASTVALUE})
trigger_prototype.description: Physical disk {#DISK.ID} temperature too big.

trigger_prototype.name: Enclosure {#ENCLOSURE.ID} health status is {ITEM.LASTVALUE}
trigger_prototype.description: Enclosure {#ENCLOSURE.ID} health status is not OK.

trigger_prototype.name: Enclosure {#ENCLOSURE.ID} operational status is {ITEM.LASTVALUE}
trigger_prototype.description: Enclosure {#ENCLOSURE.ID} operational status is not UP.

trigger_prototype.name: Fan {#FAN.ID} health status is {ITEM.LASTVALUE}
trigger_prototype.description: Fan {#FAN.ID} health status is not OK.

trigger_prototype.name: Fan {#FAN.ID} operational status is {ITEM.LASTVALUE}
trigger_prototype.description: Fan {#FAN.ID} operational status is not OK.

trigger_prototype.name: Fan {#FAN.ID} rotation speed to low
trigger_prototype.description: Fan {#FAN.ID} rotation speed to low ({ITEM.VALUE}).

trigger_prototype.name: Pool {#POOL.ID} current owner not preferred
trigger_prototype.description: Pool {#POOL.ID} current owner not preferred for this pool.

trigger_prototype.name: Pool {#POOL.ID} health status is {ITEM.LASTVALUE}
trigger_prototype.description: Pool {#POOL.ID} health status is not OK.

item_prototype.name: Port {#PORT.ID} SFP module operational status
item_prototype.description: Port {#PORT.ID} ({#PORT.SPEED}) with type {#PORT.TYPE} SFP module operational status.

trigger_prototype.description: Port {#PORT.ID} SFP module operational status is not OK.

discovery_rule.name: Power supplies discovery
discovery_rule.description: Discovery all HPE MSA power supplies.

item_prototype.name: Power supply {#POWERSUPPLY.ID} operational status, numeric
item_prototype.description: Power supply {#POWERSUPPLY.ID} in location "{#POWERSUPPLY.LOCATION}" operational status (numeric)

trigger_prototype.name: Power supply unit {#POWERSUPPLY.ID} health status is {ITEM.LASTVALUE}
trigger_prototype.description: Power supply unit {#POWERSUPPLY.ID} in {#POWERSUPPLY.LOCATION} health status is not OK.

trigger_prototype.description: Power supply unit {#POWERSUPPLY.ID} in {#POWERSUPPLY.LOCATION} operational status is not OK.

trigger_prototype.description: Power supply unit {#POWERSUPPLY.ID} in {#POWERSUPPLY.LOCATION} temperature too big.

trigger_prototype.name: Volume {#VOLUME.ID} current owner not preferred
trigger_prototype.description: Volume {#VOLUME.ID} current owner is not preferred for this one.

trigger_prototype.description: Volume {#VOLUME.ID} health status is not OK.
